subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A trade involving the Nets, the Lakers and the Rockets gave New Jersey two first-round draft picks to dangle in discussions with Denver for Carmelo Anthony, the Nuggets’ star forward.
snippet: A trade involving the Nets, the Lakers and the Rockets gave New Jersey two first-round draft picks to dangle in discussions with Denver for Carmelo Anthony, the Nuggets’ star forward.
